column4: I have came here for a low-priority issue. I tried guides and I thought I would do better with a one-on-one with one of the fine folks here who have done it already. I am trying to get xwinwrap to work and I desire not to mess around in terminal to make it work. So I have gwinwrap, which is a python file. I installed python3 and since it also mentioned Glade, I got glade. I try to execute the script and I get a GladeXML error when t
Also, yes I did get xscreensaver.
I am sure I made somebody laugh tonight. But I am a total, absolute newb to Linux.
even if you choose not to remove them now, you will be able to do it later
